replies.message: Hi Shahamat. This sounds like a bug. Can you please help us track these issues and submit the problem to support through our Help Center? http://on.fb.me/1wPavZU -Ryan

How to send messages without switching to the standalone messenger app:

If you're on android fones and happen to be rooted, use titanium backup or rom toolbox to freeze messenger...then clear data and cache for fb main app and you guys should be able to do your chats and pms inside fb
